components.data:
Inoculate fungal material into 300 µL rich growth medium in a 2 mL micro-centrifuge tube.

Grow at RT for 3-4 days.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Inoculate fungal material into 300 µL rich growth medium in a 2 mL micro-centrifuge tube.

Grow at RT for 3-4 days.

components.data:
Freeze culture tubes in LN2

Freeze dry over night
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Freeze culture tubes in LN2

Freeze dry over night

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
Annotation on step 2 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation: Optional: Place frozen tube in tube rack inside a paper bag to prevent samples flying away when vacuum is released.
source_data.thread_text: Optional: Place frozen tube in tube rack inside a paper bag to prevent samples flying away when vacuum is released.
source_data.body: Optional: Place frozen tube in tube rack inside a paper bag to prevent samples flying away when vacuum is released.

components.data: Add 50 µL 0.6mm glass beads to freeze-dried sample in 2 mL tube and grind using Tissue-Lyser LT for 5 mins at 50 Hz
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 50 µL 0.6mm glass beads to freeze-dried sample in 2 mL tube and grind using Tissue-Lyser LT for 5 mins at 50 Hz

components.data: Add 500 µL lysis buffer to pulverised sample. Vortex to mix
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500 µL lysis buffer to pulverised sample. Vortex to mix

Lysis buffer for extraction of DNA from fungal material. Contains ionic and non-ionic detergents. Contains RNAse-A.

 

Composition:

NaCl 150mM
EDTA pH 8.0 1 mM
Tris Base pH 8.0 10 mM
Polyvinylpolypyrrolidone (PVPP) 2%
IGEPAL-CA630 0.5%
Sodium deoxycholate 0.5%
SDS 1%
RNAse-A 100 µg/mL

components.data:
10% SDS solution
Dissolve 10 g SDS in 80 mL ddH2O
Adjust volume to 100 mL
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
10% SDS solution
Dissolve 10 g SDS in 80 mL ddH2O
Adjust volume to 100 mL

components.data:
1M Tris Base, pH 8.0

Dissolve 12.114g Tris-Base in 80 mL ddH2O

pH to 8.0 with 10 M HCl
Adjust volume to 100mL
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1M Tris Base, pH 8.0

Dissolve 12.114g Tris-Base in 80 mL ddH2O

pH to 8.0 with 10 M HCl
Adjust volume to 100mL

components.data:
0.5 M EDTA, pH 8.0
Add 18.61 g of disodium EDTA•2H2O to 80 mL of ddH2O
Adjust the pH to 8.0 with NaOH (~20 NaOH pellets)
Adjust volume to 100 mL
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
0.5 M EDTA, pH 8.0

Adjust the pH to 8.0 with NaOH (~20 NaOH pellets)

components.data:
3 M NaCl 
Dissolve 17.532 g NaCl in 80 mL ddH2O
Adjust volume to 100 mL

source_data.description:
3 M NaCl 
Dissolve 17.532 g NaCl in 80 mL ddH2O

components.data:
Add 500µL IGEPAL-CA630 to 82.3 mL ddH2O

Stir until dissolved
components.name: Description

Add 500µL IGEPAL-CA630 to 82.3 mL ddH2O

Stir until dissolved

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 5 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

source_data.description:
Add 0.5g Sodium deoxycholate

Stir until dissolved

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

components.data:
Add 10 mL of 10% SDS stock solution

Stir until dissolved
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 10 mL of 10% SDS stock solution

Stir until dissolved

Annotation on step 8 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

source_data.description: Add 5 mL of 3M NaCl stock solution

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

components.data: Add 200 µL of 0.5 M EDTA (pH 8.0) stock solution
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 200 µL of 0.5 M EDTA (pH 8.0) stock solution

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

source_data.description:
Add 1 mL Tris-Base (pH 8.0)

Stir until dissolved

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 10 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

components.data: Add 1mL of RNase A (10 mg/mL) stock solution
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1mL of RNase A (10 mg/mL) stock solution

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer

source_data.description: Store lysis solution at 4˚C

components.data:
Add PVPP

Add 2g Polyvinylpolypyrrolidone, stir until dissolved.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add PVPP

Add 2g Polyvinylpolypyrrolidone, stir until dissolved.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 7 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer
Annotation on step 7 of Fungal DNA Lysis Buffer
source_data.annotation: PVPP precipitates phenols, tannins, alkaloids which may inhibit enzymes or damage DNA
source_data.thread_text: PVPP precipitates phenols, tannins, alkaloids which may inhibit enzymes or damage DNA
source_data.body: PVPP precipitates phenols, tannins, alkaloids which may inhibit enzymes or damage DNA

components.data: Heat to 45 ˚C for 5 mins, shaking at 1200 rpm.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Heat to 45 ˚C for 5 mins, shaking at 1200 rpm.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 5 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation: Alternatively: Shaking rack on max for 10 mins @ RT
source_data.thread_text: Alternatively: Shaking rack on max for 10 mins @ RT
source_data.body: Alternatively: Shaking rack on max for 10 mins @ RT

components.data:
Add 0.5 vol (250 µL) 3 M Potassium Acetate to lysis mix.

Vortex to mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 0.5 vol (250 µL) 3 M Potassium Acetate to lysis mix.

Vortex to mix.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation: Potassium salt of SDS is highly insoluble. Will precipitate SDS and protein in the absence of ethanol.
source_data.thread_text: Potassium salt of SDS is highly insoluble. Will precipitate SDS and protein in the absence of ethanol.
source_data.body: Potassium salt of SDS is highly insoluble. Will precipitate SDS and protein in the absence of ethanol.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation:
3 M Potassium Acetate, pH 5.5
Dissolve 29.445 g Potassium Acetate in 80 mL ddH2O,
pH to 5.5 with 10 M HCl
Mass: 98.15 g/mol
Target working concentration: 0.3 M
source_data.thread_text:
3 M Potassium Acetate, pH 5.5
Dissolve 29.445 g Potassium Acetate in 80 mL ddH2O,
pH to 5.5 with 10 M HCl
Mass: 98.15 g/mol
Target working concentration: 0.3 M
source_data.body:
3 M Potassium Acetate, pH 5.5
Dissolve 29.445 g Potassium Acetate in 80 mL ddH2O,
pH to 5.5 with 10 M HCl
Mass: 98.15 g/mol
Target working concentration: 0.3 M

components.data: Centrifuge at 12 K rpm for a minimum of 15 minutes @ 4˚C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 12 K rpm for a minimum of 15 minutes @ 4˚C.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 7 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction

components.data: Transfer supernatant (~ 650 µL) to fresh 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer supernatant (~ 650 µL) to fresh 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tube.

components.data: Add 1 vol chilled Isopropanol ( ~ 700 µL ) to the supernatant, mix well, incubate -20˚C for 1hr.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 vol chilled Isopropanol ( ~ 700 µL ) to the supernatant, mix well, incubate -20˚C for 1hr.

components.data: Centrifuge at 12 K rpm for a minimum of 15 minutes at 4°C. Decant gently or aspirate supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 12 K rpm for a minimum of 15 minutes at 4°C. Decant gently or aspirate supernatant.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 10 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation: Take care not to dislodge DNA pellet
source_data.thread_text: Take care not to dislodge DNA pellet
source_data.body: Take care not to dislodge DNA pellet

components.data: To the pellet add 500 µL 70% ethanol stored at -20°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To the pellet add 500 µL 70% ethanol stored at -20°C.

components.data: Centrifuge at 12 K rpm for a minimum of 3 minutes at 4°C. Discard supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 12 K rpm for a minimum of 3 minutes at 4°C. Discard supernatant.

components.data: Repeat wash step with 500 µL of cold 70% ethanol. Spin and discard supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat wash step with 500 µL of cold 70% ethanol. Spin and discard supernatant.

components.data: Dry pellet in speed-vac at 45˚C for 5-10 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dry pellet in speed-vac at 45˚C for 5-10 minutes.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 14 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction

components.data: Re-suspend pellet in nuclease free water or TE buffer (10 mM Tris pH 8.0, 1 mM EDTA pH 8.0).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend pellet in nuclease free water or TE buffer (10 mM Tris pH 8.0, 1 mM EDTA pH 8.0).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 16 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation: Some samples may require heated shaking (45˚C @ 1200rpm for 10 mins ) followed by manual pipetting to fully suspend pellet. Especially in polysaccharide-rich samples.
source_data.thread_text: Some samples may require heated shaking (45˚C @ 1200rpm for 10 mins ) followed by manual pipetting to fully suspend pellet. Especially in polysaccharide-rich samples.
source_data.body: Some samples may require heated shaking (45˚C @ 1200rpm for 10 mins ) followed by manual pipetting to fully suspend pellet. Especially in polysaccharide-rich samples.

source_data.description: Add 50 µL 3M Sodium Acetate pH 5.5

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation:
3 M Sodium Acetate, pH 5.5
Dissolve 24.6103 g Sodium acetate in 80 mL ddH2O
pH to 5.5 with 10 M HCl
Vol to 100 mL
Mass: 82.0343 g/mol
Target working concentration: 0.3 M
source_data.thread_text:

Dissolve 24.6103 g Sodium acetate in 80 mL ddH2O

Vol to 100 mL

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of Quick Fungal DNA Extraction
source_data.annotation: Sodium ions re-solubilise SDS to prevent excessive precipitation in DNA pellet
source_data.thread_text: Sodium ions re-solubilise SDS to prevent excessive precipitation in DNA pellet
source_data.body: Sodium ions re-solubilise SDS to prevent excessive precipitation in DNA pellet
